definition: every voice gives praise (idiom); with an extensive public reputation
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
all/each and every/in all cases
a monument/an upright stone tablet/stele/CL:塊|块[kuai4],面[mian4]

sentences.english: From there, word spread of her skills and business grew rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 自那時起，她的纔能有口皆碑，業務擴大很快。

sentences.english: In terms of quality the goods produced by our trust are universally acclaimed.
sentences.chinese: 我們公司生產的產品在質量上是有口皆碑的。

sentences.english: Ruiai's marine furniture is with grandiosity sculpt, delicacy detail, andwiagoodpublic praise.
sentences.chinese: 瑞愛船用傢俱造形大氣，細節精緻，在業內有口皆碑。

sentences.english: We Zhangcha knitting factory in the city of quality and service are legendary.
sentences.chinese: 在張槎針織城我們廠的質量和服務是有口皆碑的。

sentences.english: This company is well-established and reliable.
sentences.chinese: 這家公司有口皆碑而且可靠。

sentences.english: This company is well-eatablished and reliable.
sentences.chinese: 這家公司有口皆碑並值得信賴。

sentences.english: This is one of the first american poems to be widely praised in europe .
sentences.chinese: 這是在歐洲有口皆碑的美國早期詩歌之一。

sentences.english: Our company is well-established and reliable.
sentences.chinese: 我們公司有口皆碑且信用可靠。

sentences.english: He is, by all accounts, a superb teacher.
sentences.chinese: 他是位有口皆碑的好老師。

definition: lit. praise fills the roads (idiom); praise everywhere/universal approbation
to be renowned
see 沒說的|没说的[mei2 shuo1 de5]
public praise/public reputation/commonly held opinions/current idiom
resounding/loud/well known/famous
known to everybody
to count as number one (idiom); second to none/outstanding
to make a name/to become famous
voices unanimous in praise (idiom); with an extensive public reputation
favorable criticism/positive evaluation
reckoned to be first or second best (idiom)/one of the very best/to list one by one
understood by everyone (idiom); well known/a household name
to commend/to praise
flourishing reputation
to win the hearts of the people/to be popular among the masses
excellent in every respect/flawless
